data.name: Emotes creator tool - Content +
data.detailed_description:
Emotes Creator Tool Content+ pack is a DLC including some new elements for your emotes:
- Balls designs (soccer, basket, tennis...)
- Monsters designs (vampires, zombies...)
- Eggs designs
- Crackers designs
- Rocks designs
- Vegetables

48 new design to use in your creations
data.about_the_game:
Emotes Creator Tool Content+ pack is a DLC including some new elements for your emotes:

data.short_description: 48 new elements for your emotes monsters, balls, eggs and more
